data.title: Best in San Diego county
data.text: All the staff here are super helpful and friendly. They have a quality selection of bikes for sale and to rent. I used their tandem electric bike and it made our cruising around Carlsbad such a relaxing and enjoyable experience.  Their mechanic was very knowledgeable as well. I also appreciate that they support our local schools -- that is a good community partner!

data.title: Bike rental
data.text:
The staff at Pedego were awesome.  Really cheerful, helpful and just all around cool.  Their bike selection was good, everything looked well maintained.  Mike was great and hooked us up with a little extra time after giving us some local knowledge on where to go and how to get there.

Would definitely rent from them again.

data.title: Great fun for all ages
data.text: We rented bikes for our family and had a blast! The owners were helpful in training is quickly and gave us great advice for an enjoyable ride. My mom who is 63 and hadn't been on a bike in 30 years easily got it and loved it. My 9 year old rode tandem with my husband and my 4 year old rode in a trailer behind me. Everyone loved the drive in the ocean, the fresh air and great outdoor time with the family

data.title: Terrific Experience
data.text: Went on the Dali Lama tour with Denise today.  Haven't rode a bike in 15 years but you receive patient instruction in the back parking lot and was able to do the 18 mile ride with no problem.  LOVE that throttle to help you get started, do the hills, and go against the headwind.  Will go again now that I'm familiar with the bikes.  Hubby is thinking of getting a Pedego to commute to work.  He's also thrilled that it's an outdoor active sporting thing we can do together for many years to come.  Will definitely go again!  Thanks Denise.

data.title: good staff and one hour was perfect
data.text: they get you out fast after a good instruction on how to use the electric bike and the one hr test ride takes you to the 101 along the beachfront and back...a good economical way for you to test ride the bike which is a lot of fun

data.title: Bikes and staff are excellent
data.text:
We took the gang on a two hour round trip ride from Carlsbad to Encinitas.  Electric bikes better than expected and delivered great fun for everyone.  Really enabled us to stretch out how much ground we could cover.  We had a 2 year old and teen, everything was so smooth.  
Highly recommend. Great fun and team at Pedego.  Thank you!

owner_response.author: Denise B, Manager at Pedego Carlsbad, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So glad you and your family enjoyed the ride.  It's a great way to see the coast.  We look forward to your next visit.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: So Much Fun!!!
data.text: My husband and I had so much fun renting pedego electric bikes. We did not take a tour but went on our own for 1 1/2 hours. The bikes are awesome. We rode 25 miles round trip along the coast with the help of the battery. Especially good for the hills. :) Would do it again in a heart beat.

owner_response.author: Denise B, Owner at Pedego Carlsbad, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So glad you enjoyed your ride.  It is a perfect way to see the coast.  We look forward to seeing you both again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great bikes, electric and manual
data.text:
We got 3 bikes (2 adults, 1 child) from Pedego to ride locally. We ended up going a good 15 miles.

Service was great; my son needed to try a few different bikes to find the right fit. Staff was very helpful with him.

The cruisers we got were well geared (!!!) for the nearby rolling hills. I've rented plenty of cruisers and these were the first geared I've had. That made for a very comfortable ride. All 3 bikes were in great shape.

They also have a large number of electric bikes that I'm sure would be a *blast* to tool around on, if you're less into the workout thing.

owner_response.author: Denise B, Owner at Pedego Carlsbad, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So glad you and your family enjoyed the ride.  With all the hills along the coast we found the gears are a must!  Hope you all can come back again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome Bike Shop.
data.text:
Pedego Carlsbad is one of the best bike shop in San Diego county, if not the best bike shop. They are definitely my favorite. I trust them to work on my road bikes and also my mountain bike. The staff and the owner are very friendly and professional. They also have bike rentals. Which after renting a couple of Tandems is why I decided to write a review. 
 	I brought my girlfriend along to rent one of Pedego's electric cruiser tandem. Once again the staff made everything hassle free. They safety checked the bike, made sure the batteries were fully charged, and told me if I had any problem on the road to call them and they will help me out. Anyway, my friend and I rode the tandem all the way down the coast up to the top of Torrey Pines. We were even pulling tired road bikers along to their destination down the coast. It took us about three hours and a quick stop at 7 Eleven. If you didn't know, Torrey Pines, from Carlsbad is about a 35-40 mile bike ride. So to conserve the battery, my friend and I only used the motor for hills. However, on the back we used to motor. Luckily we conserved the battery because as we returned the bike, the battery ran out of juice a block away from the bike shop. Our legs were done after the bike ride. We had so much fun and this is why I will be referring all my friends, and anyone to this bike shop. Thanks Pedego!!

owner_response.author: Denise B, Owner at Pedego Carlsbad, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So glad you and your family enjoyed the ride.  With all the hills along the coast we found the gears are a must!  Hope you all can come back again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A great way to see the beauty of Carlsbad
data.text: We rented a pedal bike from the staff at Pedgo and had a beautiful afternoon riding along the coast of Carlsbad. There are great bike paths and beautiful places to stop along the way. The staff was very helpful. Tip... there are hills out there so you may want to consider the electric bike option. Great activity very reasonably priced.

data.title: best bike rental
data.text: Pedego rents electric bikes but also good old traditional bikes. I rented a traditional Trek bike. This was my best rental bike ever: good brakes and all the 21 gears worked perfectly well. Prices are extremely competitive .

data.title: Fun!
data.text: Super nice people and really fun bikes!!!  We enjoyed the orange electric bikes so much!  Great location and perfect place to ride around.

data.title: Wow
data.text: Renting an electric bicycle for my wife and me was probably the best activity done in our trip. Our toddler really enjoyed it!! This is a must!!

data.title: Rented and Purchased After A Great Experience
data.text:
Denise and her whole crew at Pedego Carlsbad is all great. I rented a Trail Tracker last week for the entire day and liked it so much I bought one!  They were extremely helpful and friendly during the entire process.  
Give them a try.  You'll love it. I can't recommend them highly enough.

data.title: Don't worry, be happy - had not ridden a bike in years, I'm 72, but this was a breeze with Zach leading the way.
data.text:
Cashed in a Christmas gift today and took a 15-mile electric bicycle roundtrip tour from Carlsbad to Oceanside, California. Yes, 15-miles and I didn't even work up a sweat. The bicycle was powerful enough that I didn't peddle at all. Nice narrated tour by Zach Cummins over a headset. 

Photos and captions at: http://MoKnowsPhotos.zenfolio.com/p102578246 

I am 72 years old and was leery, since I have not ridden a bike in years. Hey, you never forget how to ride a bike. Zach gave me good instructions, a helmet, and had me take a turn in their safe parking lot before heading out for Oceanside. Much better than just renting a bike because he knew the safest routes to take and constantly watched traffic so I did not have to. He taught me hand signals for making tours (the same signals we used in automobiles before turn signals were invented!) Maybe next vacation at Tamarack Beach Resort, I will take the Encinitas tour, then the third time here I will rent one on my own. Check out my photos.

data.title: Great family fun!!!
data.text: We stayed in Carlsbad after an exhausting week at disneyland. Being an outdoorsy family we wanted to find a family activity that everyone could enjoy. We rented bikes from Pedego and had a great time. The service was great. They fitted is well with bikes and we all around great people. Our ride was amazing. We rode along the beach and watched whales the whole time. Great family day. Would rent from them again.

data.title: Loved It.
data.text: We would do this again in a minute.  We rented the bikes and went out on our own adventure.  We headed down the coast towards Encinitas and stop at Union to have a refreshment.  You do get exercise on these bikes.  We then headed back towards Carlsbad and went through town to Oceanside.  They're alot of fun.

data.title: Great place to just rent a bike too!
data.text: Great guys who really into electric bikes but I rented a nice 21 speed for a day of riding.   Great rates and the equipment was in very good shape.  Sorry I came here on my last day!  It will be my first stop next time.  Thanx, John!

data.title: Beat the traffic while going green!!
data.text: What a blast! JaDee & I had so much fun on these electric bikes! We were passing people who were peddling their butts off and sweating up a storm on this hot day, not us! We went to lunch in Leucadia, cruised down Neptune, stopped at Lemongrass, enjoyed the view from Swamis to Solana, stopped at a couple cute shops. Then we headed back and stopped at Iron Cross Surfboards to say hello! What a fantastic day! If you haven't tried these bikes, do it! This is a great way to spend a day cruising our beautiful coastline and beat the summer traffic! They even have weekly rentals & sales! I think I need to buy one ;) The staff and the owners are so awesome! I work at a near by resort and send our guests there all the time but this is the first time I have tried it... I am hooked!!!

data.title: Awesome guided tours
data.text: This was an awesome electric bike tour. Our guide Kevin took great care of my wife and me. We went on a 20 mile tour to the south along the beaches. Before returning we stopped for awhile at a very quiet and beautiful meditation garden. Kevin made sure that our ride was safe and interesting to Encinitas and back to Carlsbad. We liked the tour so much that we booked another one the next day to Oceanside and it's long pier. Our bikes worked well were well maintained and easy to learn to ride. Highly recommended.

owner_response.author: Denise B, Owner at Pedego Carlsbad, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Hans,

I am so glad you enjoyed our tour and tour guide so much that you came back the second day.   Our goal is that ever customer have as positive of an experience as you have.  Thanks so much for your the feedback - we look forward to hosting you and your wife again soon!

Denise Buckingham
Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response
